softwareSystems.name: IIO Framework

components.description: Application startup/shutdown coordination, initialization sequences, and graceful termination handling
components.name: Application Coordinator

properties.Splash screen management: ScopySplashscreen startup feedback and progress messaging (gui/include/gui/widgets/scopysplashscreen.h)
properties.Application initialization: QApplication setup, Qt attributes, logging, crash handling coordination (main.cpp)
properties.Application restart coordination: ApplicationRestarter singleton for graceful restart handling (core/include/core/application_restarter.h)
properties.Command line processing: CmdLineHandler for argument parsing, script execution, device auto-connection (core/include/core/cmdlinehandler.h)

components.description: Crash detection, error report generation, and stack trace collection
components.name: Crash Reporting System

components.description: CLI argument parsing and command execution
components.name: Command Line Handler

components.description: JavaScript runtime, script execution, automation interface, and programmatic API access
components.name: Scripting Engine

components.description: Internationalization support and language pack management
components.name: Translation Service

components.description: Centralized configuration storage, user preferences, plugin settings, and persistent application state
components.name: Preferences Management

components.description: Centralized logging, debug output, error tracking, benchmark, and diagnostic information collection
components.name: Logging System

components.description: Device discovery, connection lifecycle, hardware abstraction, and unified device interface
components.name: Device Management

properties.Device abstraction: DeviceImpl and Device classes providing unified hardware interface (core/include/core/device.h; core/include/core/deviceimpl.h)
properties.Device management: Device creation, connection, disconnection, restart, reload with state tracking (core/include/core/devicemanager.h)

components.description: Manages packages installation and distribution
components.name: Package Manager

components.description: Dynamic plugin loading, lifecycle management, dependency resolution, and plugin architecture foundation
components.name: Plugin System

properties.Plugin manager: PluginManager for dynamic loading, sorting, filtering, and lifecycle control (core/include/core/pluginmanager.h)
properties.Plugin repository: PluginRepository singleton for plugin management, metadata handling, plugin discovery (core/include/core/pluginrepository.h)
properties.Plugin interface: Plugin base interface defining compatible(), onConnect(), onDisconnect() and other contracts (pluginbase/include/pluginbase/plugin.h)

components.description: Storage and management of available plugins and their metadata
components.name: Plugin Repository

components.description: Dynamic loading and instantiation of plugin libraries
components.name: Plugin Manager

components.description: Common API contract that all plugins must implement
components.name: Plugin Interface

components.description: Common UI widgets, plot widgets, style management
components.name: UI Framework

properties.Plot widgets: Plotting widgets, measurement displays, signal visualization (gui/include/gui)
properties.Common components: Menu section widgets, collapse headers, custom controls for patameters, enhanced input widgets, etc. (gui/include/gui; gui/include/gui/widgets)
properties.Style management: QSS-based styling with dynamic theme switching (gui/style)

components.description: Main window coordination, detached tool windows, and workspace management
components.name: Window Management

properties.Main window coordination: ScopyMainWindow lifecycle, application initialization, event handling (core/include/core/scopymainwindow.h)
properties.Advanced docking system: KDDockWidgets backend for professional docking layouts (gui/include/gui/docking)
properties.Detached tool management: DetachedToolWindowManager for separate tool windows, multi-monitor support (core/include/core/detachedtoolwindowmanager.h)

components.description: Tool registration, menu organization, tool lifecycle coordination, and unified tool interface
components.name: Tool Manager

components.description: Real-time status display, device connectivity indicators, operation progress, and system notifications
components.name: Status Bar

components.description: Page navigation, home page, device browser, preferences pages, packages page, and application flow control
components.name: Application Pages

properties.Navigation coordination: Tool selection flow, page switching, menu state management (core/include/core)
properties.Tool stack management: ToolStack container extending MapStackedWidget for key-based page switching (core/include/core/toolstack.h)
properties.Home page system: ScopyHomePage for device scanning, connection management, device browser (core/include/core)

components.description: Industrial I/O communication, command queuing, and connection management

components.description: The Register Map allow access to reading and writing registers for devices connected to Scopy
